column1: overpitched and outside off, Powell leans into this half-volley. Extends his arms and laces a drive through the covers
back of a length and slanting in at off stump, 136ks, Powell camps in the crease now and pats the ball defensively to cover
wide of the crease, Shami cranks upto 143ks, gets this short ball to skid off the pitch and ping the thigh pad, beating the pull
short and seams back in again, 140ks, Powell plays outside the line and takes it on his thigh again
on a length and angling away outside off, 141ks, defended in the direction of midwicket
nice and full, shapes in a touch against the angle, poked back to the bowler off a thin inside edge
back of a length and angling across off, 143ks, stabbed back to the bowler
pitched up and outside off, Hemraj tips forward and cracks it straight to the covers
short and on the hips, 140ks, picked off straight to midwicket
short on the hips again, deflected to Chahal at fine leg
back of a length and seaming away outside off - good pace and bounce in this pitch - Powell is squared up as he plops a leading edge in front of point
much fuller and much wider outside off, 142ks, Powell has a mighty whoooosh at it... and misses. He swung wildly down the wrong line
pitched up on middle, 142ks, Hemraj presses forward and blocks it solidly to cover
good length and jagging away outside off, Hemraj dangles his bat out in the channel and watches it skip past the outside edge
fuller and skiddy on middle, jabbed to the covers
143ks, pitches outside leg and swerves into the pads, as Hemraj plays around his front pad, and does not quite connect with a flick
a bit too full on middle, 144ks, Hemraj goes over the top. Lovely flow of the arms as he chips it straight over Shami's head
short and wide outside off - this is the other Shami - Hemraj latches onto it and carves a cut up and over backward point for back-to-back fours
full-toss swinging into the hips - the yorker goes wrong - picked away behind square, this time by Powell
on a length and slanting away outside off, 141ks, punched up to mid-on
veering into the pads, again, forward and worked away between midwicket and mid-on
full and wide outside off, 143ks, no shot offered
shorter and on off - or just a shade outside - he gets up on his toes and stabs to the covers
back of a length on middle, the ball is coming onto the bat nicely, tapped back to the bowler
nice and full, nibbling away outside off, draws the outside edge from a nervy poke, does not carry to Dhawan tumbling to his left at slip
dipping full ball on leg stump, possibly the slower ball, nudged away to mid-on

Shami has Hemraj playing on! Back of a length and outside off - not that short for the pull - Hemraj still goes for it and winds up dragging it back onto the stumps. First wicket for Shami on return. The middle stump is titled back
good length and seams in, inside-edged away to the leg side
back of a length and angling away outside off, flashed to deep third man
nice and full on middle, tapped away to the right of mid-on. Chahal's overthrow hands WI another run
on a length and on a fourth-stump line, punched through the line, mid-off (Kohli) throws himself to his left, but the ball sneaks through him
shorter and hits the splice and rolls back to the bowler
a bit too full on the pads, Shami gets away as Hope flicks straight to midwicket
back of a length and keeps low outside off, the batsman adjusts and jabs to the covers
picked off to midwicket, where Pant dives to his right and makes a half-save. WI decide against a single, when it was probably on
good length on off, blocked watchfully to cover
hip-high short ball on middle stump, Powell sizes it up and short-arms it away to the midwicket boundary. Pant gives the chase but comes second in the race
pitches on leg stump and seams away sharply, hits the outside edge near the shoulder of the bat and pops wide of point
back of a length on off, 141ks, neither too short nor wide for the leverage to pull. Bottom-edges it onto his pad
short, wide, lashed to point, can't piece the packed off-side infield
good length and attacking the stumps, Powell hangs back and drops the ball beside his feet
That baseball stint, eh, Powell? Full and outside off, Powell picks this slower one, frees his arms, gets under it, and launches it cleanly over mid-off.
full on the stumps, forced to mid-on
fuller than a good length, starts outside off and wobbles away further. Left alone. Off-side wide
back of a length and skidding in at off, wedged to point
shorter on off, Hope rides the bounce and steers to point
Hope gets on top of a short ball outside off and punches it imperiously, opening the face and finding the gap behind square on the off side
wide of the crease, holds its line outside off, glided to point
full, wide of the crease, and angling into a forward-defensive push
on a length and just a shade outside off, bunted away to mid-on
short of a length and outside off, sits up to be hit. Powell obliges and belts it through the covers. Boom
back of a length and nipping into leg stump, knocked into the gap at midwicket for one. Happy, Tyagi?
full and angling across off, played to point
pitched up and outside off, driven crisply to square point, where Pant fumbles, allowing a single
in-between length outside off, Powell skips back, and muscles it over midwicket. He has already hit five fours and a six
full and swinging into the pads, clipped away to the right of deep square leg
back of a length on off, patted to point
on a length and outside off, Powell drives it on the up and drives gloriously between covers and mid-off
very full on off stump, tapped to mid-off
Hope allows this length ball to come to him outside off, then opens the face and directs a single to deep third man
glanced off the pads to deep square leg
back of a length outside off, but angling into Powell. Looks to pull, but misses, and the delivery hits the top of his knee. Lbw appeal turned down
slower from Khaleel. Rolls his fingers over this one, and this length ball outside off is punched down to mid on
good length on leg, and angling across Hope's body. Sticks his bat out, and steers this away to point
back of a length on middle, and Hope drags a pull from outside the stumps. Mistimed to deep midwicket off the back foot

good length on off, and skidding into his pads. Punched to mid off, but Shami - the fielder - misfields at that position, and the ball races away to the boundary. Shami didn't bend low enough to pick up that ball
full toss outside leg stump, and going into MSD's gloves on the bounce. Powell looks to flick it square, but misses
big appeal for lbw! But not given. Back of a length outside off, and the ball stays low. Comes into Powell's pads as he looks to pull, and it hits his front leg. Height saves Powell
full on middle, and he gets his front leg out of the way, before driving to wide long off for a walking single
paddled fine past MSD! Full on middle, and he gets down on one knee and ramps this towards fine leg. Shami gives it a chase
slog swept! Powell means business here. Full on middle, and swept with the spin right over the square-leg fielder! Kept his eyes on the ball, and played it with the turn
good length on leg, and skidding through. Flicked off the back foot to the sweeper-fielder on the leg side
full on leg stump, and pushed down the ground to long on. They walk across for one
full outside leg stump. Pushed to midwicket off the back foot, but Kohli's lurking there
full outside off, and angling further away. Hope throws his hands at it, but can't make the connection. Through to MSD
good length on off, and going away from Hope. Looks to dab it to third man, but under-edges the ball towards the keeper
good length on off, and nurdled with the angled bat to point off the back foot. No chance of a single
slower ball, back of a length outside leg. Nudged off his hips to the vacant square-leg region
firmly punched back to the bowler, but Khaleel bends and intercepts. Length ball outside off, and struck well off the back foot
length ball angling in, and worked off his hips to deep midwicket for a walking single
full on middle, and flicked off his pads to deep midwicket off the back foot. His ninth ODI fifty and third against India
full on leg stump, and the legbreak forces an error from Hope. He looks to defend, but the ball hits his front leg instead. Lbw appeal turned down
full on middle, and Hope takes a big stride forward to drive straight back to the bowler
tossed up on middle, and Hope gets his front leg out of the way, and then drives through the ball's line. Straight to mid off
full outside leg stump, and Powell is quick to look for the slog sweep. Goes with a wild swing, but the ball turns into his body, and hits his back leg
full on middle, and Hope lunges forward to defend with soft hands. A good comeback over from Chahal
good length on off stump, and too close to his body for the cut. Tries to play that, and mistimes the shot towards square leg
back of a length on middle, and Hope looks to pull. But the ball stays low, and he inside-edges the shot onto his body. The West Indians are struggling to time that particular shot
length ball on middle, coming into Hope's body after hitting the deck. Cramps the batsman for room, and he muscles a leg-side flick to midwicket
full on off, and steered with the angled bat to the point region

full just outside off, and Powell clears his front leg to smack this over long on. But Dhawan's near the boundary and Powell holes out after a good innings. Replays suggest he toe-ended the shot and Khaleel is among the wickets once again. Gabbar wraps up the celebrations with a thigh slap.
Khaleel from around the wicket, and the length ball is guided off the back foot to third man. He'll keep strike
tossed up on middle, and confidently driven with the turn to long off
turn! Teasing, full on off and Samuels comes forward to defend. But extra spin takes it just past his outside edge

full on middle and leg, and Samuels looks to defend. But the ball goes straight on, hits his front leg, and the lbw appeal is given! Samuels considers reviewing, but by the time he can decide... the square-leg umpire tells him 'time's up!'. Chahal gets the big wicket as we take the day's first drinks break.
Full on off, and he lunges forward to defend
full just outside off, and he takes a big stride forward to smother this towards cover
full on middle, and he shovels a drive to mid off
length ball outside off, and cut off the back foot to Pant in the deep
overpitched outside off, and Hetmyer reaches forward to drive. But he's too late into the shot
full on off, and pushed off the front foot to cover point
back of a length on off, and the extra bounce forces Hetmyer to sway away from the line of the ball. A well-directed short ball from Khaleel

short again, and this lands on middle but is going down the leg side. Hetmyer swivels to pull, and can't connect with the shot. But surprisingly, the umpire doesn't call it a wide. Hetmyer isn't too pleased
back of a length on middle, but this one's definitely going down leg
full on middle, but he's driven early through this slower ball from Khaleel. Chipped in the air and Kohli runs behind from mid on, but the ball falls just wide of his fingertips
full outside off, and he tentatively pushes with the spin to cover
full on middle, and caressed down the ground to long on off the front foot. They walk across for one
full on leg stump, and nudged away to Shami at deep backward square. Excellent effort in the deep (pick-up-and-throw in one motion) ensures it's just a single
full just outside off, and he uses the angled bat to work this against the turn to Jadeja at deep midwicket
slower through the air. Full on middle, and he takes a couple of steps forward to defend. Played to the leg side
length ball on middle, and spinning into leg stump. Hetmyer rocks back and punches to midwicket, but can't find the gap
full on leg stump, and driven with the angled bat to deep extra cover
good length from over the wicket. Lands outside off, and spins into the stumps. Pulled down the ground to long on
full from over the wicket again to Hope. Lands just outside off, and tapped back to the bowler
full on middle, and worked off his pads to square leg. A nice, early call for one
full on off, and he tries to nudge it towards the leg side, but leading edge takes the ball to cover instead
full just outside off, and driven with the spin with the straight bat. Jadeja intercepts
full on middle, and he meets the ball with a big stride forward. Pushed back to the bowler
full on middle, and Hope looks to defend, but all he can do is inside-edge the shot onto his pads
tossed up on middle, and Hope tries to drive. But the ball is so overpitched that he almost yorks himself. Anyway, does well to dig it back past the bowler to long off
length ball on middle, and that's Hetmyer's strong suit. Uses the depth of the crease to pull right over midwicket! Classy way to help West Indies cross the 100-run mark
full on middle, and he takes a couple of steps forward before nudging towards midwicket
full on leg, and he gets down on one knee to sweep behind square. Shami intercepts once again
good length on off, and spinning into the left-hander. Hetmyer makes room by shuffling behind, and then punches it down to long off
full just outside off stump. Hope walks down the ground and muscles a punch-shot to long on
full on middle, and nudged with the spin to Rohit at square leg
full on off, and Hetmyer uses his feet this time! Skips down the ground and then uses his wrists to smack this over deep midwicket! Typical West Indian left-handed batsman. Lovely
good length outside off, and Hetmyer drags a flat-batted pull down the ground to long on
full just outside off, and Hope lunges forward with the angled bat. Pushed to cover to collect the over's tenth run
full just outside off, and the drive off the straight bat is mistimed to mid on. The lack of pace on the shot actually helps them collect the single
good length on off, and angling away from Hetmyer. He tries to muscle a cover drive through the infield but the ball flies past his outside edge instead
short on leg, and Hetmyer tries to pull. But he gloves it to MSD's right and takes off for a single instead

soft! Back of a length outside off, and Hope tries to break the shackles with a pull shot. But he merely top-edges that shot, and Shami's extra pace has done the trick. In the air for a while, and Dhoni skips to his left to complete the easiest of catches
overpitched right outside off, and the straight drive is inside-edged towards square leg instead. Hetmyer calls for the second run early
back of a length outside leg stump as Hetmyer tries to make some room. Uncomfortably pulled to deep midwicket, but he'll comfortably take the double
full outside off, but angling into the right-hander. Defended
slower through the air as it lands outside off. Looks to defend off the back foot, but the ball takes the inside edge instead. Goes between his legs to square leg
length ball just outside off, and spinning away after hitting the deck. Pushed to point with the angled bat
full on middle, and defended down the ground to Jadeja. Soft hands
full outside leg stump, and Hetmyer once again goes down on one knee and slog sweeps right over deep backward square! Fabulous shot
overpitched on leg stump, and steered away to the vacant region on the leg-side for a run
length ball outside leg stump, and Hetmyer nudges this off the back foot to deep backward square
flies right over MSD! Short ball on off, and Powell tries to pull. But the extra bounce takes a top-edge and whizzes over the keeper for four. Can't blame the bowler, can't blame the keeper
full just outside off, and guided with the bat's open face to deep point for one
slower ball from Shami, but Hetmyer picks this very early. Clears his front leg, and pulls it right over deep midwicket! They're enjoying the pace
full just outside leg stump, and Hetmyer makes room by going to the leg side, and absolutely smashes a straight drive past the fielder at mid on! Tracer bullet
good length just outside off, and he cuts this to deep point for a single
good length on middle, and nudged off the back foot to deep backward square for a walking single
good length on off, and punched off the back foot to wide long on. Just a single though
length ball on middle, and pushed off the back foot to cover
overpitched on middle, and Hetmyer tries to play towards midwicket, but the ball takes a leading edge to cover instead!
slower through the air. Full outside off, and driven to long off for one
full on leg, and clipped off his boots with soft hands. Definitely two on offer, but Khaleel's misfield ensures it's a third. Kohli doesn't look happy
just short of a good length on leg stump, clubbed away to deep midwicket
back of a length and angling away outside off, ignored in the channel
shortish and outside off, flat-batted away straight to mid-off
slower offcutter outside off, run away with an open face to point
back of a length and slanting away outside off, opens the face and dabs to point
short, wide, Powell latches onto it and smears a cut to the sweeper cover boundary. Powered it away
tossed up and turning into the pads, clipped away to deep square leg. They take on Pant's arm and take two in the end
looped up on middle, stretches out and blocks it away to the leg side
fired on off, short, whipped away to midwicket
tossed outside off, Hetmyer skips out and drives a single down to long-on. He raises his bat and draws applause from the change room. Fine fifty from him
drifts in at off, and breaks away sharply past the outside edge. Beautiful from Chahal. It wasn't far away from off stump either
on a length and turns away outside off, guided to point
back of a length and on the hips, tucked away to deep midwicket
on a length and outside off, Powell stands tall and flat-bats it away in the air to the left of Khaleel. Bombs away
slower short ball outside off, Khaleel rolled his fingers across it, Powell simply let it go
slower offcutter outside off, on a length, Powell opens the face and guides a single to deep third man
yorker, swinging into the toes, jammed out to midwicket
slower ball outside off, 118ks, but it is too short. Hetmyer waits for it to arrive, then clobbers it over the midwicket boundary - his fourth six
shorter and outside off, spins in, reads the wrong'un off the pitch and punches up to cover
skidder, finishes on the pads, clipped to midwicket
drifting down leg, swept flat and hard to short fine, where Shami fumbles
sharp legbreak, starts outside off, breaks back in, cramps Hetmyer for room. Played back
pushed through on off, blocked to Chahal off the front foot
back of a length and spins in, hangs back and whips a single wide of midwicket
on a length and angling away outside off, short third man is up, Hetmyer aims to run it past him. No dice
on a length on middle, Hetmyer stays leg-side of the ball and hoists it up and over the covers. Hetmyer wants three, he's halfway down the pitch, but he'll have to settle with a double in the end
full and veering down the leg side, all it needed was a tiny little deflection. No bat involved, though
short on middle, camps back and punches a single to the off side
very full on middle, Powell camps back and blocks back to Umesh
back of a length and angling into off stump, Powell picks it up, brings his bottom hand into play, and shovels it on the up over midwicket
short and angling across off stump from around the wicket, Hetmyer takes this half-tracker from outside off and nails it through the covers off the back foot
darted onto the pads, whipped away to deep midwicket

There comes the arm ball from Jadeja, brings India the breakthrough. Darted in at 95ks, Powell wants to slog-sweep it into the skies. He can't touch it. Jadeja rattles the leg stump and dismisses Powell for 22 off 23 balls. End of a rollicking stand
full on middle and leg, knocked to square leg
short and outside off, draws a back-foot punch down to long-on
full on middle, blocked back to the bowler
back of a length and holds its line outside off, forced off the back foot to deep point
back of a length and on a fourth-stump line, Holder inches forward to deal with it. Blocked to cover
shorter and outside off, Holder ventures deep in the crease and directs the ball to deep third man
full and wide outside off, Hetmyer stays leg-side of the ball and drives on the up. Crunnnnnnnched through the covers
full-toss, angling into middle, driven straight past the bowler. Not sure if that was deflected off the non-striker
short and outside off, swatted away behind square on the leg side. 200 up for WI, and that's drinks
slid in from wide of the crease, back of a length, defended
on a length and outside off, forced away to the covers
pushed through on middle and leg, knocked to midwicket
much fuller and outside off, Holder clears his front leg and drives to short cover
arm ball, shortish on middle, punched back to the right of Jadeja
full and outside off, Holder leans out and drives to sweeper cover
back of a length and angling into middle, punched back down the ground
back of a length and nips in to take the inside edge and roll away past leg stump to long leg
back of a length and angling away outside off, Hetmyer uses the angle and pace to his advantage. Plays late and guides it away past the left of short third man
full-toss on middle, driven straight to mid-off
another full-toss on middle, this is pumped to mid-off's right
lifter on off, beats Holder for pace and bounce, flapped away behind square on the leg side
arrowed into the pads, short, whipped to deep midwicket off the back foot
half-tracker outside off, muscled away to deep midwicket
on a length and spins away outside off, driven with the turn through the covers
fired outside off, whipped away to the leg side
half-tracker outside off, and Jadeja is published. Hetmyer ventures deep in the crease and smokes it over the midwicket boundary
back of a length and outside off, swatted away behind square off the back foot. Hetmyer moves into the nineties
near yorker on middle, mighty full, Holder jabs to short midwicket
fuller than a good length and straightens away outside off. Holder reaches out for the ball with his hands and is beaten lavishly
full on off, a whirl of the wrists sends the ball to deep square leg
hip-high short ball on the leg stump, stylishly pulled away behind square. Chahal dives gingerly to his right and lets the ball sneak through to the fence
slower ball but he strays down leg, leg-side wide
full-toss on middle, laced down to long-on
full on off, driven to mid-off
short and outside off, forced to the covers off the back foot
skidder on off, pushed to mid-on off the back foot
whipped off the pads to deep midwicket
full and angling into the pads, Holder works a single to the leg side
back of a length and turns into the hips, glanced away for one
pushed through on off, Holder plays late, opens the face and guides it away fine to the third-man boundary. Excellent batting from West Indies
nice and full on middle, bunted away to mid-off's right
a bit too full on off. Ladies, gents, and kids, that's how you play an on drive. Holder presses out and drives it straight of the fielder inside the ring. He holds his pose like a boss and rightly so

Shami pulls his length back, on off, worked away to the leg side to bring up the fifty partnership. Looks like Hetmyer has jarred his shoulder while taking that single. He needs some attention from the physio
length on off, opens the face and steers it off the face to point

Hetmyer has his hands aloft and salutes to the change room. What a way to bring up a century. What a hundred this has been. This is Hetmyer's third in ODI cricket. Full and outside off, 140ks, Hetmyer stays leg-side of the ball and hoists it up and over the covers. Goes all the way. Kohli applauds Hetmyer
dug in short on middle, rolls his wrists now and controls a pull to deep mdiwicket does Hetmyer
flat and short outside off, stabbed back to Jadeja off the back foot
short and spins back in, hangs back and punches down the ground to long-on
full on the stumps, eased to long-on

Jadeja has Hetmyer holing out to Pant at long leg. This was pushed through flat on the pads, the batsman drops down to one knee and slog-sweeps it in the air. He can't connect it properly and finds Pant in the deep. End of a mighty fine innings from Hetmyer. Chahal applauds him as he walks back
on a length and slides in at middle, blocked to cover off the front foot
fired outside off, drilled down to long-off
short and outside off, Holder stands up tall and secures a single down to long-off
pitches on off and turns away, takes the outside edge and sneaks away past slip

Chahal pins Nurse in front. This looks quite adjacent, but Nurse opts to challenge the on-field out decision. Looks like a slider, full, Nurse plays around his front pad, and is hit below the knee-roll in line with middle. The tracker returns three reds. Hitting leg stump. Now 300 seems pretty far away for WI
darted across off, defended off the back foot
tossed outside off, driven past the left of the bowler for one
tossed on middle, smoothly driven down to long-off
full just outside off, and the paddle to the leg side takes the outside-edge of the bat and races away to the third-man boundary! Lucky, but WI will take it
length ball just outside off stump. Defended back to Jadeja off the front foot
length ball, wide outside off. Holder stands tall, frees his arms, and crunches a cut in front of square! Long handle allows him to smack this right over cover
full on middle stump, and smothered with the angle to Chahal at midwicket
good length on middle, and whipped off his pads to deep backward square
full just outside off, and defended with the turn to the leg side
full on middle, and the legbreak is firmly defended off the front foot
full outside leg, but Holder makes room by backing away and then lifts it straight to Pant at long on. But Pant drops it and the ball hits his knee, and eventually rolls away to the long-on boundary
full on leg stump, and Holder lunges forward to defend
full just outside leg, and spinning across Holder's body. Taps it off the front foot, but the ball lobs into the air. Chahal dives to his left, but the ball falls just short
full on middle, and driven with the turn past Chahal to long off

full just outside off, and sliding through. Bishoo misses the leg-side flick and MSD whips the bails off! Stumped? Let's go to the third umpire. Bishoo stretched forward trying to defend, but is his back leg on the line? Looks touch-and-go, but there's something behind the popping crease. Minimal, but enough to save Bishoo.
short, wide outside off. And cut away hard off the back foot to the fielder in the deep
full on leg stump, and flicked off his pads! Played very fine, and the fielder there has absolutely no chance
full just outside off, and driven with the straight bat towards the vacant mid-on region. Umesh runs from mid off to intercept
short, but with no real pace. Pulled from outside the stumps to deep midwicket
good length outside off, and Bishoo tries to ramp it over the keeper. Misses the shot, but the umpire calls it wide for height
back of a length on off, and cramping Bishoo for space. Worked off his chest to the fine-leg region
length ball to end the over. Gets big on Holder, who defends it away to point with soft hands
full just outside off, and swept along the ground to deep midwicket
bowled around his legs! Overpitched outside leg stump, and Holder tries to paddle sweep. He misses, and Chahal hits as the ball turns into the stumps. Now we're well and truly into the tail-end
full on leg, and nudged off his pads to midwicket
full on middle, and worked with the spin to fine leg. They walk across for one
full just outside off, but the googly comes into the batsman. Firmly defended off the front foot
full on off, and defended with soft hands once more to see Chahal's spell out
good length on off, and nudged off his hips to the vacant square-leg region
good length from round the wicket. Roach keeps his bat's face open and nudges it to deep point for a single
short and wide, and Bishoo slices a cut past Rohit at point for a single. Rayudu cleaning up in the deep
yorker! Wide outside off, and all Roach can do is wedge it back to the bowler. Accurate
full outside off, and pushed away from his body to the cover-fielder in the deep
full outside off, and tapped off the front foot to cover. But straight to the fielder
good length on off, and defended off the back foot. Ensures his covers his stumps, before getting bat to ball
length ball just outside off, and cut off the back foot to the fielder in the deep. Carefully collecting singles as much as possible
good length on off, and he defends it away to point with the angled bat
good length on middle, and nudged off his hips to the vacant square-leg region
full and fast on off, and the defensive shot takes an inside edge to deep backward square. A wry smile from Umesh. Could've easily chopped on there, Roach
full on off, and blocked off the front foot to see the over out
good length just outside off, and defended to point with the angled bat. The fielder, Rohit, has a shy at the non-striker's stumps, and that means it's overthrows!
length ball on off, and defended off the back foot to point
length ball on middle, and Bishoo makes room, and then deflects a shot past MSD's right
good length on middle, and he rides the bounce to defend towards the leg side
full toss on leg stump, and he misses the flick. Atleast he'll collect the extra run
full on middle, and clipped off his toes to deep backward square
full at the base of off stump, and pushed to mid off by Bishoo
good length outside off, and punched off the back foot to cover
length ball angling in from outside off. Roach tries to muscle a drive through the covers, but mistimes the shot back to Khaleel
back of a length outside off, and pulled right over deep midwicket! Played uppishly, and that fetches him half-a-dozen
full on off, and tapped with soft hands towards the non-striker. They want the single, but Khaleel scampers to his right to intercept
slower ball, wide outside off. Roach places a cut smartly past point, and that forces Rayudu to give the ball a mighty chase near the boundary line
short and wide outside off, and Roach can't cut it away. Through to MSD and West Indies will have to wait for that 300th run
full on leg, and tapped off the front foot to Kohli at midwicket. They can't pinch a single
short on leg stump, and through to Dhoni on the bounce. Bishoo ducks, but the umpire reckons that's a fair ball
full on leg stump, and Bishoo looks to check-drive towards cover. But the offcutter takes the outside edge, and goes just past off stump to the keeper
full on leg stump, and flicked fine! That's 300 for West Indies. Played brilliantly between the keeper and short fine leg
back of a length on middle, and forcing Bishoo to tiptoe. Defended towards the leg side from near his body
drilled! Full on off, and he gets his front foot out of the way, and absolutely muscles a straight drive past mid off!
smacked! Length ball on middle, and Roach walks forward before swatting a pull straight into the cow-corner boundary
full and wide outside off, forcing Roach to reach out for it. Slapped to deep point
full on off, and he opens the bat's face to steer a cut to deep point once again
yorker on off, but Roach gets lucky! Gets bat to ball, and squirts this past the leg stump. Was a wonderful ball that deserved a wicket, but Roach did well to get his bat down in time
overpitched but wide outside leg stump. Dhoni misfields too, and the batsmen manager to scamper across for one extra run
low full toss just outside off, and he slices a drive through to the fielder in the deep
full, and aimed on middle stump. But Roach backs away, and muscles a drive right over the fielder at cover! Rayudu gives it a chase in the deep, and West Indies finish on 322 for 8!
length ball, wide outside off. And Rohit lazily tries to cut. But he toe-ends the shot to point
back of a length outside off, and angling into Rohit. Defended with the straight bat off the back foot
full on off, and Rohit firmly blocks off the front foot. Played back to the bowler on this occasion
good length on middle, and going down leg. But Rohit tries to nudge it square, and mistimes the shot towards the leg side
full on off, and pushed with the angled bat to midwicket. India get off the mark, but Bishoo's throw at the batsman's end isn't backed up by Hetmyer. Allows Rohit to return on strike
edged past first slip! Length ball angling in, and Rohit tried to punch. Takes the outside edge of his bat and whizzes past the cordon. Third man has no chance either
pitched up and outside off, 147ks, Dhawan leans into it and drives straight to mid-off
full and wide outside off, 147ks, again, Dhawan throws his bat at the ball and smears it over point for four
off-stump yorker, 140ks, Dhawan manages to dig it out
back of a length and outside off, 149ks - pace like fire - patted to point
pitches outside leg and swings to catch the pad as Dhawan falls over the flick. He was late onto this 147ks thunderbolt

Oshane Thomas strikes on debut and thumps his chest. This dismissal isn't too different from that of Powell. Short and a bit too close to off stump, Dhawan wants to force it through the covers - neither a cut nor a punch. Instead, drags this 147ks ball back onto his stumps
wide of the crease, full and holds its line outside off, no shot from Rohit
wide of the crease, again. Short and holds its line outside off, Rohit punches on the up to the covers
wide of the crease, seams back in to find the inside edge and sneak past leg stump
on a length and outside off, Kohli stretches out and eases it to point
Kohli jumps across off and works a single to the midwicket region
full and aiming for off, Rohit's forward defence intervenes
full on middle and leg, 143ks, glanced away behind square on the leg side
Thomas lets rip a 147ks bouncer outside off, Kohli drops his gloves and lets it thud into the gloves of the keeper
back of a length and zipping through the channel, 143ks, no shot again
144ks but straying into the pads of Kohli, who tickles it away fine of long leg for four
short and outside off, 146ks, Thomas has Kohli hopping, skipping, and fending it off to point
bouncer outside off, forces Kohli to sink under it
wide of the crease and angling into a worked single to midwicket
wide of the crease, full and angling into the pads. Kohli plays an aerial flick but gets it to the left of Bishoo at midwicket and finds the boundary
sliced away to the covers off the front foot
on a length and outside off, Kohli's bat turns in his hands as he mistimes it to mid-off
lifter on middle, 135ks, at least 10ks slower than Thomas, but Roach still has Kohli ducking for cover
full and slanting in at off, Kohli aims for the leg side but ends up chipping a leading edge in front of cover
pitched up at off, 148ks, driven back to Thomas
Rohit is beaten for pace. Back of a length and skidding into him at 146ks, Rohit is late onto the leg-side flick but they sneak in a leg bye
on a length and nips away outside off, Kohli jabs at it and nicks it off an outside edge to the third man boundary
really full at the pads, 147ks, Kohli shuffles across and flicks it neatly to the midwicket boundary
speared full and just a shade outside off, another leading edge, this runs away wide of cover
This is a Rohit special. Hip-high short ball on middle, 146ks, Rohit uses the pace of the Jamaican to his advantage. He pulls it into the stands beyond backward square leg
kicks up from a length and outside off, snatches the outside edge and runs to third man
back of a length and skidding into the hips, deflected to long leg
wide of the crease, full and outside off, pushed back down the pitch
dug in short on middle, Kohli swivels on the back foot, rolls his wrists, pulls with great control and finds the backward square leg fence
on a length and outside off, opens the face and glides to third man
back of a length and outside off, Rohit looks to force the ball through the covers. The result is an inside edge that wanders away towards mid-on
back of a length and bursts off the pitch outside off, 147ks, Kohli flashes under it and misses
short on off, 144ks, has Kohli hopping and fending back to the bowler
Kohli is quick to latch onto a short ball outside off. He swivels and pulls along the ground to the left of midwicket and right of mid-on
Kohli is fighting fire with fire. 149ks, short and jumps outside off. Kohli does not flash under this. He gets on top of it and upper-cuts it over point. Scythed away
back of a length and nipping through the channel, ignored by Kohli now
pitched up and outside off, 144ks, Thomas has Kohli reaching out for a drive away from the body. The outside edge streaks away to deep third man
wide of the crease, on a length and just outside off, Kohli lets the ball slide off the face to third man
Rohit stands tall and punches this short ball from outside off to cover
full on middle, patted to mid-on
back of a length on off, tapped to covers
too full and straight, Rohit picks it up and lifts it effortlessly over square leg. Whoa, those wrists
full and just a shade outside off, pushed defensively to the covers
short and angling into the body, as Kohli walks out, and clips it away through square leg for another four
full and angling into a gentle little push to short midwicket off the front foot
Kohli shimmies out again, drives to mid-off now
back of a length and angling into off, dropped into the covers
full and sprayed into the pads, ball bad, the fielding is even worse. Flicked away, Roach at short fine leg, takes his eyes off the ball, and lets it burst through him
back of a length and outside off, punched on the up to the covers off the front foot
short and slides on outside off, Kohli hangs back and stabs it back to the bowler
Dropped at backward point? Bursts through the hands of a leaping Hemraj. Short and outside off, Kohli has a crack at it and slashes in the air and gets away. He gets to his fifty as well
back of a length on the stumps, driven down to long-on
straight ball outside off, driven through the line to long-off
shorter offbreak, spins back in, Kohli stands tall and punches a single to long-on
rank long-hop on the leg stump, Rohit reads it so very quickly and tonks it over square leg
back of a length and angling down leg for a wide
full and slanting in, Kohli presses forward and defends back on off stump
shorter on off, Kohli drops it defensively in front of cover
too full and too straight, Kohli drives it gloriously through midwicket. The ball purrs away to the boundary
back of a length and outside off, jammed to the covers
tighter on off, defended into the covers
full and outside off, pushed to mid-off
turned off the pads to deep square leg
on a length and spins in, defended with the break to square leg
pushed through outside off, back of a length, blocked to cover
shorter on the pads, whipped away to deep midwicket off the back foot
worked away to the right of short midwicket off the back foot
short and holds its line outside off, punched to sweeper cover
on a length and outside off, run down to third man
full on the stumps, bunted to mid-on
back of a length and outside off, jabbed to the covers
back of a length and shapes in to find the inside edge and roll away behind square
short and outside off, punches with an open face to third man does Kohli
Kohli steps out, meets a half-volley and flicks to midwicket
short and turns in, knocked away behind square on the leg side
slides on outside off, Kohli opens the face and glides it through point
just short of a good length on middle, punched down to long-on
full on middle, uses his feet and drives a single to long-on
tucked off the pads to deep square leg
shortish and outside off, slapped to sweeper's right
back of a length and angling into middle as Kohli shimmies out and clips a single to the leg side
short and outside off, Rohit rides it down to third man
short on off, short-armed away to the right of short midwicket
short on off, opens the face and plays to backward point
shorter and outside off, punched hard into the ground but can't get it past backward point
Holder keeps hitting a back of a length, the line is outside off, and backward point is in business again
flat and outside off, driven down to long-off
back of a length and sliding into middle, Rohit hangs back and jabs it away to midwicket
tucked off the pads through the square leg region
dragged down outside off, shovelled to midwicket off the back foot
short on middle and leg, punched to K Powell at short midwicket off the back foot
chopped to backward point
full outside off, and tapped off the front foot to cover. The ball rolls to the fielder
length ball angling into his body, and nudged off the back foot to midwicket. Two dots to start the session after the drinks break
back of a length outside off, and Kohli pounces onto that in a flash! Rides the bounce, and cuts it square past the fielder at point
good length angling in, and flicked off his hips to deep backward square for a walking single
length ball outside off, and zipping away after pitching. Rohit looks to cut, but plays under the ball. Through to Hope
slower ball to end the over. Wide outside off, forcing Rohit to stretch. Mistimed to cover
floated up outside off, Kohli lunges forward and drills a wristy drive past long-off
quick fizzer on off, chopped away to point
full on middle, patted down to long-on off the front foot
short on off, punched down to long-off
dropped short and outside off, the result is nothing but a four. Kohli rocks back and square-cuts it away with great authority
whipped off the back foot to the leg side for one
Kohli shimmies out, shorter and drifting down leg, glanced away fine for a double
Kohli ventures down the pitch again. Adjusts to this short ball outside off and runs it down to deep third man
on a length and nibbles away outside off, Rohit has a loose prod. He aims to run it down to third man himself... and misses
short and outside off, swivel-pulled over midwicket
Kohli steps out to another short ball on off, half-heartedly swats it away behind square
short, wide, cracked to the left of sweeper
looped up on off, Rohit stretches out and drives it to the left of Bishoo
Rohit dances down the track, takes a full ball from middle and drives a single down to wide long-on
tossed outside off and turns away a touch, defended with the break to point
short and finishes on the pads, tucked off the back foot to the leg side
tossed on middle, Rohit hares down the track, meets the pitch and launches it over the long-on boundary. Regal six
half-tracker outside off. Rohit sat back, waiting for this. He muscles a pull over midwicket for back-to-back sixes
back of a length on off, possibly a slower ball, worked away to deep square leg
full on off, presses forward and defends back to Thomas
short on off, guided to point, and Rohit brings up a fifty of his own. Kohli embraces his vice-captain
pitched up and outside off, tapped to point
tucked off the pads through midwicket
a bit too full and outside off, Rohit leans into it and creams a drive through the covers
on a length and spins away outside off, pushed to cover
tossed on middle, driven back to Bishoo
fired outside off, forward and driven down to long-off
full on off, eased down to long-off off the front foot
worked off the pads to the right of the leg umpire
full on off, bunted to mid-off
short on off stump, Kohli hangs back and works it away to midwicket
short at 141ks, on middle, beats Kohli on the hook and pings the thigh pad
shuffles across to meet a full ball on middle, flicked away, bisects the two men in the deep behind square
short and outside off, 132ks, run down to third man
hip-high short ball on middle, swatted to deep backward square leg
short and rises outside off, fended off to the leg side
full legbreak outside off, tapped to cover
googly, jammed hastily to leg side. Bishoo has overstepped by a big margin
this free-hit is fired full and wide outside off, Rohit reaches out for the ball and utterly batters it through the covers for four. Bishoo's front foot has strayed again
Rohit ventures down the track, Bishoo darts one and pings the pad. The free-hit is out of the way
back of a length on middle, forced to midwicket off the back foot
half-tracker on middle, Rohit jumps back and nails a pull over midwicket. There's no stopping that
full on middle, defended
drifting down leg, deflects a paddle-sweep to short fine leg
full outside off, and he frees his arms to absolutely crunch a cover drive through the infield! Man in the deep, a mere spectator
tossed up on off, and spinning inwards. Pushed back to Nurse
full on leg, and swept behind square to the man in the deep
good length outside off, and punched with the bat's open face to the man in the deep
overpitched on middle, and Rohit casually lifts his back leg, and then whips square to the leg side for a single
chipped right over midwicket! Lucky Kohli. It was a length ball spinning in, but the ball stayed low, and therefore forced the false shot from Kohli. Could've easily been the end of his innings on 96
good length on off, and punched with the straight bat - off the back foot - right back to Roach
short on off, and Rohit pulls with the angle to Hetmyer at deep backward square. Played along the ground
good length outside off, and he tiptoes and works it from outside the stumps. The ball rolls away to square leg
good length just outside off, and Kohli uses his soft hands to tap this back towards Rohit
full and wide outside off, and he caresses a cover drive past the man at deep extra cover to reach his 36th ODI hundred!. Easy peasy from Kohli.

follows it up with a better shot! If that is even possible. Back of a length outside off, extra bounce from Roach, but Kohli simply tiptoes and rides the bounce to cut between point and the fielder at third man
full on off, and worked off his toes to long on for a walking single

good length outside off, and this one's a skidder. No real spin, and he pounces onto that in a flash! Cut square, and far enough from the fielder at deep point. This is really a masterclass from Kohli
full just outside off, and pushed with the spin to long on for one
juicy full toss and sent into the second tier! Waist high on off, and Rohit swivels to pull this right into the stands behind deep midwicket
full and wide outside off, and tapped off the front foot to cover
full just outside off, and defended back to he bowler
full on middle, and clipped over wide long on! Lazy elegance from Kohli. Picks the length early, and simply places the shot where he wanted to

through the legs of cover! Oh, dear. Windies are now disintegrating. Samuels the guilty party. It was a length ball outside off that Kohli thumped off the back foot, but the ball went right through the fielder's legs
normalcy. Dabbed to third man for a single. Length ball angles in, and he guides it to the fielder near the boundary
full on middle, and tapped with soft hands to midwicket. Says 'no' to the single
short outside off, but Rohit charges down the wicket and then pulls in front of square! Not easy with Roach's 140+ pace, but Rohit makes it look so damn easy

slower ball, wide outside of. Rohit had backed away a bit too early, but he still manages to swing the ball through the ball's line. Smacks it right over cover, and there's no one in the deep to cut it off
whippage from Kohli, but stopped by Powell at wide long on. Full on off, and he smacked this down the ground towards deep midwicket
drops his length, and this turns inwards from off stump. Defended off the back foot. Rare
full on off, and nudged off his pads to the vacant square-leg region. The umpire skips out of the ball's way as short fine leg intercepts
almost edges it! Length ball outside off, but not spinning in enough. Tries to run this down fine, but the ball goes to the keeper
length ball spinning in, and pulled off the back foot to deep midwicket
full just outside off, and tapped back to Nurse. He dives to his right to stop the single
length ball on off, and spinning away after pitching. Kohli backs away, and then cuts square, beating the fielder at backward point as well as the man in the deep. Supreme
this is simply amazing. Length ball on off that spinning away, and Kohli times his punch to absolute perfection. Past cover and past wide long off as well for his 21st four
shorter from Bishoo. Length ball on leg, and Kohli comes down the ground. Chooses to defend it back to Bishoo thereafter
full on leg stump, and Kohli comes down the ground again in a bid to whip it to the leg side. But mistimed to midwicket
length ball on middle, and muscled off the back foot to long on for a walking single. Kohli doesn't look happy with that shot
good length outside off, and the wrong'un comes into Rohit. Blocked off the back foot
picks his spot and deposits it there! Full on off, and he skips down the ground, and then check-lifts it right over long on for another maximum. Precise power on display. Not overdoing it at all
full on leg stump, and clipped away to Bishoo at deep midwicket
Rohit joins in! Length ball spinning into Rohit's pads, and he has no trouble in swiveling and pulling right over the fielder at fine leg. He's on 94 now
back of a length outside off, and the offbreak is tapped off the back foot
full on leg stump, and swept to deep backward square. Misfield from Roach allows them to steal the second run
classy way to get to your hundred! Full just outside off, and he caresses a drive past cover. Teasing chase for the man in the deep, but the placement is absolutely bonkers. Another 19-run over
full on middle, and he chips this over Bishoo's head while walking down the ground. Lands in no man's land
full outside leg stump, and Rohit backs away further to meet the ball. Pulled along the ground to the diving Oshane Thomas at deep backward square

edged past the keeper! Rohit won't mind it. Tries to punch this legbreak through the covers, but the extra spin induces the feather-edge off his bat. With third man inside the circle, that's another boundary for India
full on off, and driven to long on
good length on middle, and punched with the spin to cover

beautiful delivery! And Kohli isn't waiting. He knows he's stumped, and the Guwahati crowd rises to its feet. Full on middle, and spinning across Kohli. He tries to drive to cover, but he misses and Shai Hope whips the bails off. Kohli's back foot is nowhere near the crease, and replays say that Bishoo hasn't overstepped either
Holder returns, and he bowls a length ball outside off. Punched to cover
good length on off, and he swivels to pull. But the slower ball (113kph) deceives Rohit, and he mistimes the shot to short fine leg
good length, again slower from Holder. Tapped off his hips to the vacant square-leg region

pulled right over wide long on! Only Rohit can pull off a shot like that. Back of a length outside off, and Rohit simply rides the bounce and then thumps it from outside the stumps and right into the stands
good length just outside off, and he taps this off the back foot to long on. They walk across for one
back of a length on off, and Rohit brings out the Nataraja shot. Played to deep backward square
full on leg stump, and driven to long off for a walking single
full on middle stump, and pushed with the turn to mid off
full just outside off, and pushed to midwicket
what happened there? Full outside off, and spinning away from Rohit. He tries to slog towards the leg side, but the ball stays low, and takes the toe-end of his bat. Rolls down to short third man
full on off, and tapped away to the leg side
length ball on middle, and skidding into Rohit. He makes some room, and defends it back to Bishoo off the back foot
full and wide outside off. Left alone by Rayudu
good length outside off, and he opens the bat's face to run it down to third man for a walking single
full just outside off, and he drives to cover. Well timed, but straight to the fielder
full on off stump, and attempts to slog towards the leg side. Mistimed to midwicket
good length just outside off, and pulled in front of square to deep midwicket
full on middle, and flicked away to deep midwicket
good length outside off, and the legbreak is blocked off the back foot
full on off, and driven with the turn to wide long off for a single
overpitched on middle stump. Rohit takes a big stride forward and defends it back to Bishoo
Rohit's on a rampage! Almost on the third tier. Tossed up outside off, and Rohit skips down the ground and smacks it right over the head of Devendra Bishoo
good length on off, and spinning away from Rohit. Cut in front of square to the man in the deep
full on off, and he tentatively pushes to cover off the front foot. An excellent over from Bishoo, barring that one bad ball

feather touch! Full on leg, and he plays the leg glance so well! Played with the closed face of the bat, and Shai Hope's dive to his left is simply futile. No ball because there weren't five players in the circle!
toe-ends a slog but lands near Bishoo at third man. Length ball outside off, and angling away from Rohit. Mistimed totally
full on middle, and driven to mid on. Can't find the gap though
full just outside off, and Rayudu glances this fine to third man for a walking single
cheeky but doesn't come off. Length ball on middle, but going down leg. Rohit opens his stance to try and ramp it over short fine leg, but he can't get bat to ball
good length outside off, and dabbed to Bishoo at third man for another walking single
guides this full-length ball to third man once again
low full toss on middle, and driven to long on. He'll keep strike
tossed up outside off, and Rohit tries to slog towards the leg side. The bowler gets the better of him this time. Mistimed to long on
overpitched on off, and he caresses a drive right past the diving mid-on fielder!
full just outside off, and defended with the spin to cover
full on off, and spinning across the batsman. Defended off the back foot
good length just outside off, and defended off the back foot to the off side
full just outside off, and he lunges forward to defend towards point
full and aiming for off, Rohit pushes it back to Thomas
full and slanting into the pads as Rohit works a single wide of midwicket
back of a length and kicks up outside off, the extra bounce beats Rayudu
bouncer down leg, wide, re-set the radar, Oshane
full and holds its line outside off, 137ks, Rayudu simply ushers the ball through to the keeper
Rayudu twinkles down the track. Manufactures his own length - a half-volley. Meets the pitch of the ball and disdainfully carts it over Thomas' head. Huuuuuge six. India surge past 300
full-toss on middle, Rayudu opts to hang back and dinks it away to square leg
short, outside off, Rayudu reaches out and chops to point
keeps it short and outside off, hit to point again
darted short and outside off, Rayudu punches the ball through the line and gets across to the other end
good length on off, tapped away to the covers
much slower and outside off, Rohit powers a single down to long-off
just short of a good length and outside off, Rayudu leans back and taps it through the covers for one
full just outside off, and driven with the angled bat through the infield
excellent yorker but Rohit wedges it onto his boots and survives! Lands right near his toes on off stump
full toss on middle stump, and Rohit sees the cherry like a watermelon! Swings across the line, and muscles a pull towards the long-on boundary
toying with Oshane now! Low full toss on off stump, but Rohit shuffles across - exposing all three stumps - and then plays a Marillieresque shot past short fine leg
full toss on middle, and Rohit backs away, and then punches a shot right over mid off! India need four to win now.
good length outside off, and he smothers a mistimed cut to cover point for a single.
Rohit finishes with 152! Finishes the game in style. Full outside off, and he lifts this right over Bishoo and long off. India win by eight wickets and with 47 balls to spare
